true_meaning: to fall in and out of love
literal_translation: to attach the heart and break it

true_meaning: to share feelings and feel relieved

literal_translation: to set fire in the heart
to give and take the heart
to have a burden on the heart
to make the brain into curd
it is necessary to apply the brain
for the nose to be cut
to make the ears stand up
to put the matter into the ear
not even a louse crawls in the ear
the ground slipping from under the feet
for the feet to get uprooted
to be mounted on the head
to bring a storm upon the head
to have debt on the head
to fill air into the chest
for the chest to become cool
to keep a hand on the chest
to not take breath in the chest
for the mind to become full
to work having set the mind

true_meaning: by autumn / before the first leaf falls
over my dead body / as long as I’m alive
to run away in fear (tail between legs)
literal_translation: to slip away with tail tucked

true_meaning: to get one’s hands dirty (do something unsavory)
to box in / surround on all sides
to get stuck in one’s head
to hide behind a woman’s pallu (show cowardice)
literal_translation: to hide behind a woman's pallu

true_meaning: to let the kids go hungry / starve
